desc.en: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.thai: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.ko: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亞瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。阿露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亚瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。爱露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.jp: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.thai: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.ko: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.zh_tw: 多亏對策委員會学生们大展身手，才使得亞瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得阿露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得亚瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得爱露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。

desc.en: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.jp: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.thai: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.ko: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.zh_tw: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒亞瑠他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，亞瑠最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒阿露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，阿露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒亚瑠他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，亚瑠最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒爱露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，爱露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。

desc.thai: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.ko: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十一首曲子，常在“招聘”（抽卡）页面播放。
desc.zh_tw: The 11th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays at the "Recruitment" (Gacha) page.

desc.en: The Problem Solver 68 meet the hired mercenaries and are ready to attack. Meanwhile, Abydos notices the marching enemies, only to find out it is the doings of Problem Solver 68 that they meets in the ramen store.
desc.jp: The Problem Solver 68 meet the hired mercenaries and are ready to attack. Meanwhile, Abydos notices the marching enemies, only to find out it is the doings of Problem Solver 68 that they meets in the ramen store.
desc.thai: The Problem Solver 68 meet the hired mercenaries and are ready to attack. Meanwhile, Abydos notices the marching enemies, only to find out it is the doings of Problem Solver 68 that they meets in the ramen store.
desc.ko: The Problem Solver 68 meet the hired mercenaries and are ready to attack. Meanwhile, Abydos notices the marching enemies, only to find out it is the doings of Problem Solver 68 that they meets in the ramen store.
desc.zh_tw: 便利屋68与雇佣兵集合，准备进攻。阿拜多斯方面也注意到了正在行进的敌人队伍，却意外发现就是在拉面店里遇到的便利屋68一行人所为。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68与雇佣兵集合，准备进攻。阿拜多斯方面也注意到了正在行进的敌人队伍，却意外发现就是在拉面店里遇到的便利屋68一行人所为。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 便利屋68与雇佣兵集合，准备进攻。阿拜多斯方面也注意到了正在行进的敌人队伍，却意外发现就是在拉面店里遇到的便利屋68一行人所为。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 便利屋68与雇佣兵集合，准备进攻。阿拜多斯方面也注意到了正在行进的敌人队伍，却意外发现就是在拉面店里遇到的便利屋68一行人所为。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.thai: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.ko: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。
desc.zh_tw: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.en: Unsurprisingly, the Problem Solver 68 is defeated completely. As the off-work time arrives, the Problem Solver 68 lose their backup and are forced to retreat.
desc.jp: Unsurprisingly, the Problem Solver 68 is defeated completely. As the off-work time arrives, the Problem Solver 68 lose their backup and are forced to retreat.
desc.thai: Unsurprisingly, the Problem Solver 68 is defeated completely. As the off-work time arrives, the Problem Solver 68 lose their backup and are forced to retreat.
desc.ko: Unsurprisingly, the Problem Solver 68 is defeated completely. As the off-work time arrives, the Problem Solver 68 lose their backup and are forced to retreat.
desc.zh_tw: 便利屋68不出意外地完全失败。由于此时已经到了下班时间，丧失支援的便利屋68不得不撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68不出意外地完全失败。由于此时已经到了下班时间，丧失支援的便利屋68不得不撤退。
